attributes.action: Force All Comapanys That Have Servers In The UK To Adhere To All UK Laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Companys are using the UK to host there servers/data servers, to take advantage of Londons good telecomunications links and lines to better there ''PING'' and therefore get a better flow of data, but however they do not adhere to UK law with concerns to the data Protection Act and Comsumer Protection Act.
